extends AdminBaseMgr

                                   com.workingdogs.village.DataSetException,
                                   KKAdminException

        Specified by:
        getPromotion in interface AdminPromotionMgrIf
        Parameters:
        id -
        includeCoupons - If true we add a coupon array to the promotion if any coupons exist
        includeStats - If true we calculate how many manufacturers, products, categories, customers, expressions and coupons are included or excluded from the promotion

      • getStoreTime

        public java.util.Calendar getStoreTime()
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the local store time based on the tz database time zone of the store. A list can be found here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones . They are in a string format and look like US/Pacific, Australia/Perth, Europe/London etc. and observe DST.
        Specified by:
        getStoreTime in interface AdminPromotionMgrIf
        Returns:
        Returns a Calendar object for the current store time
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
